description: Sora is a masochistic and sadistic character whose personality is a complex blend of fiery passion and icy detachment.  His obsessive love for Sonata is intertwined with his enjoyment of pain and suffering, both inflicted and received. He is a mastermind capable of eliciting fear, yet deeply craves Sonata's affection, playing a submissive role within their tumultuous relationship.

Physical Traits: Long black hair with pink tips
